summary: AMLASH/1 was an agent who received secret writing training in Paris, France, around August 1962. The Paris Station was involved with AMLASH/1 from 1962 to 1965, including recruitment, explosives training, and contacts with KUBARK assets. AMLASH/1 was involved in meetings related to a plan to assassinate AMPED, with ONTRICH and DAI HOID also involved. In January 1980, AMLASH/1 arrived in Madrid and contacted LNERGO, with plans for a debriefing to determine future plans. AMLASH/1 refused media interviews upon arrival in Madrid. AMLASH/1 is also associated with Antonio Carrillo and the postponement of a meeting between Manuel Pineiro Lozada and Delorry in Cuba.
significance: The documents suggest AMLASH/1 was an agent involved in sensitive operations, including a potential assassination plot. The connections to Cuban matters and individuals like Fidel Castro and Che Guevara, as well as the reference to a plan to assassinate AMPED, could be relevant to understanding potential motives or actors involved in events surrounding the JFK assassination, though the documents do not directly link AMLASH/1 to the assassination itself.
